stats.reach.tooltip: This item can hit blocks & entities up to §e%s§r blocks away
stats.speed.tooltip:
Affects how fast this item can be swung

§e%s §7seconds between swings
§ex%s§7 gathering speed multiplier
stats.ranged_speed.tooltip: This item takes §e%s §rseconds to fully draw
stats.ranged_damage.tooltip: Basic projectiles deal §e%s §rdamage when fired from a fully drawn bow
stats.bleeding.tooltip: Hitting entities has a 30%% chance to cause them to bleed for §e%s§r damage over 2 seconds
stats.backstab.tooltip: Hitting entities from behind cause critical hits that deal §e%s§r bonus damage
stats.armorPenetration.tooltip: Hitting an entity will always deal at least §e%s§r damage regardless of the targets armor
stats.unarmoredDamage.tooltip: Deals §e%s§r bonus damage when attacking entities with no armor
stats.knockback.tooltip: Increases how far hit entities are knocked back by a factor of §e%s
stats.fiery.tooltip: Hitting an entity sets it on fire for §e%s§r seconds
stats.smite.tooltip: Deals §e%s§r bonus damage when attacking undead entities
stats.arthropod.tooltip: Deals §e%s§r bonus damage when attacking an arthropod and applies slowness IV for 1 to §e%s§r seconds
stats.sweeping.tooltip: Attacking an entity also hits all adjacent enemies for §e%s§r weapon damage
stats.unbreaking.tooltip:
Has a chance to not take durability damage on use

§7Unbreaking level: §e%s§7
Avoid chance: §e%s%%
stats.mending.tooltip:
Consumes gathered experience orbs to repair durability by §e%s§r per experience point

§7Only active while held in the mainhand or the offhand
stats.silkTouch.tooltip: Harvesting blocks cause the block to drop instead of the usual item
stats.fortune.tooltip: Increases drop chance when harvesting or salvaging blocks
stats.flame.tooltip: Hitting an entity sets it on fire for §e%s§r seconds, projectiles ignite blocks like tnt and campfires
stats.punch.tooltip: Increases how far hit entities are knocked back by a factor of §e%s
stats.infinity.tooltip: Firing this item no longer consumes regular ammunition, special ammunition is still consumed
stats.quickStrike.tooltip: Reduces the minimum damage dealt to §e%s§r while the attack cooldown is active
stats.softStrike.tooltip: Items crafted using this tool gains increased durability
stats.fierySelf.tooltip:
Using the item has a chance to set the wielder on fire, occurs less frequent in cold biomes

§7Base chance: §e%s
§7Fire duration: §e%s
stats.enderReverb.tooltip:
Using the item angers nearby endermen and nearby ender teleportation has a chance to also teleport the wielder

§7Base chance: §e%s§7
stats.toolbelt.booster.tooltip: Provides jump boost and limited flight with strength §e%s
stats.bow.releaseLatch.tooltip: Automatically fire arrows when the bow is fully drawn
stats.bow.overbowed.tooltip:
This bow is too heavy to draw, maintaining a full draw will reduce damage & velocity over time. 

§7Max reduction:  §e%s
§7Reduction rate: §e%s
stats.criticalStrike.tooltip:
Has a chance to critically hit when hitting entities or breaking blocks.

§e%s§7 chance to deal §e%s §7damage
§e%s§7 chance to instantly break blocks

§7This effect cannot occur for blocks that are exceptionally hard
stats.intuit.tooltip: Experience gained from killing entities and destroying blocks yields honing progress at a §e%sx§r ratio

stats.magma_capacity.tooltip: The amount of thermal energy this cell can hold, compared to a regular thermal cell
item.tetra.modular.magic_capacity.label: Magic capacity
item.tetra.modular.magic_capacity.descri:
The amount of magic this module may hold and how much of that capacity is in use.
§7The capacity may be exceeded, but working the module will cost experience and magical improvements may destabilize and cause negative effects when the item is altered.

§7Magic capacity: §e%s
§7Capacity usage: §e%s

§7Requirement base: §e%s
§7Durability penalty: §e%s

item.tetra.modular.settle_full.label: Fully settled!
item.tetra.modular.settle_full_gain.desc: This module has fully settled, it is providing additional integrity
item.tetra.modular.settle_full_cost.desc: This module has fully settled, its integrity cost is reduced
item.tetra.modular.settle_full_null.desc: The simplicity of this module makes it easy to fit into place and it does not need to settle any further
settled.name: Settled
settled.description: Due to extended use this module has settled into place, it provides additional integrity
arrested.name: Arrested
arrested.description: This module is crafted from materials that will not settle over time
item.tetra.modular.synergy_indicator.emp: This module has no potential synergy bonuses
tetra/schema/repair.name: Repair
tetra/schema/repair.description: Patch up damaged and worn modules. Cycles through the modules of the item, repairing one module at a time.
tetra/schema/repair.description_details:
Patch up damaged and worn modules. Cycles through the modules of the item, repairing one module at a time.

enchantment/bluepower_disjunction.descri: Increases Damage vs Endermen and the Dragon

enchantment/apotheosis_mounted_strike.de: Deals extra damage when on a horse

enchantment/apotheosis_depth_miner.descr: Adjusts mining speed based on Y-level

enchantment/apotheosis_scavenger.descrip: Mobs killed may roll their loot tables twice

Tool can be used to bonemeal crops

enchantment/ensorcellation_curse_fool.de: Prevents experience gain when using the item.
enchantment/ensorcellation_curse_mercy.d: Prevents a weapon from dealing a lethal blow.
Increases damage dealt to Ender mobs and inhibits teleportation.
destabilized/ensorcellation_damage_ender: Reduces the effect of the Ender Disruption enchantment
enchantment/ensorcellation_damage_illage: Increases damage dealt to Illager mobs.

destabilized/ensorcellation_excavating.d: Reduces the effect of the Excavating enchantment

destabilized/ensorcellation_frost_aspect: Reduces the effect of the Frost Aspect enchantment

enchantment/ensorcellation_leech.descrip: Restores health when a mob is killed.

enchantment/ensorcellation_magic_edge.de: Slightly increases damage dealt and converts it to magic.
destabilized/ensorcellation_magic_edge.d: Reduces the effect of the Magic Edge enchantment

enchantment/ensorcellation_reach.descrip: Increases the distance that the wielder can interact with blocks.
destabilized/ensorcellation_reach.name: Destabilized: Reach
destabilized/ensorcellation_reach.descri: Reduces the effect of the Reach enchantment
enchantment/ensorcellation_smashing.name: Smashing
enchantment/ensorcellation_smashing.desc: Harvested ores will be smashed to pieces, improving yield.
enchantment/ensorcellation_smelting.name: Smelting
enchantment/ensorcellation_smelting.desc: Harvested blocks will automatically be smelted, as if by a Furnace.
enchantment/ensorcellation_soulbound.des: The item will remain with the owner after an untimely demise.

enchantment/ensorcellation_tilling.descr: Tills additional blocks in a radius.

tetra/schema/cleanse.name: Cleanse
tetra/schema/cleanse.description:
Cleanse negative effects caused by magic instability.

Experience cost is increased based on exceeded magic capacity and the amount of instability effects.
tetra/schema/sword/shared_blade/hone_dam: Hone the module to increase the damage dealt by 0.5.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 0.5 to 1.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 1 to 1.5.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 1.5 to 2.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 2 to 3.
blade_hone/damage.name: Hone: Damage
tetra/schema/sword/shared_blade/hone_spe: Hone the module to increase the overall swing speed by 7%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 7%% to 15%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 15%% to 22%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 22%% to 30%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 30%% to 40%%.
blade_hone/speed.name: Hone: Speed
tetra/schema/sword/basic_hilt/hone_damag: Hone the module to increase the overall damage by 5%%.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 5%% to 10%%.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 10%% to 15%%.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 15%% to 20%%.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 20%% to 25%%.
hilt_hone/damage.name: Hone: Damage
tetra/schema/sword/basic_hilt/hone_speed: Hone the module to increase the overall swing speed by 0.05.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.05 to 0.1.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.1 to 0.15.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.15 to 0.2.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.2 to 0.25.
hilt_hone/speed.name: Hone: Speed
tetra/schema/sword/basic_blade.name: Simple blade
tetra/schema/sword/basic_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with the given blade, or reforge it using raw materials.
sword/basic_blade.name: Simple blade
sword/basic_blade.description: A basic blade with average damage, attack speed and integrity usage.
blade/serrated.name: Serrated blade
blade/hooked.name: Hooked blade
blade/hooked.description: Hitting enemies from behind cause critical damage
blade/tempered.name: Tempered point
tetra/schema/sword/shared_blade/serrated: Serrates the blade, providing a saw-tooth edged blade. Has a 30%% chance to cause the target to bleed for 4 damage over 2 seconds. Not effective against undead.
Hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 8.
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 16.
tetra/schema/sword/shared_blade/tempered: Temper the point of the blade, greatly increasing its hardness. Causes some of the damage dealt to ignore armor.
Hone the tempered improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 3.
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 5.
tetra/schema/sword/shared_blade/hooked_1: Carve a hook into the back side of the blade, providing additional damage when hitting unsuspecting enemies. Cause critical strikes when attacking enemies from behind.
tetra/schema/sword/shared_blade/hooked_2: Hone the hooked improvement, increases the bonus damage dealt when hitting enemies from behind to 75%%.
tetra/schema/sword/shared_blade/hooked_3: Further hone the hooked improvement, increases the bonus damage dealt when hitting enemies from behind to 125%%.
tetra/schema/sword/basic_hilt/basic_hilt: Replaces the current hilt with a new one crafted from the provided material.
sword/basic_hilt.name: Simple hilt
sword/basic_hilt.description: A simple sword hilt. The sword hilt is the primary source of integrity for swords.
basic_hilt/blazing.name: Blazing
basic_hilt/blazing.description: Using this may set you on fire, more sever in hot environments
basic_hilt/ender_reverb.name: Ender reverb
basic_hilt/ender_reverb.description: Reacts negatively with nearby entities originating from the end
basic_hilt/wrap_string.name: String wrap
basic_hilt/wrap_string.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative hilt effects.
basic_hilt/wrap_leather.name: Leather wrap
basic_hilt/wrap_leather.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative hilt effects.
basic_hilt/wrap_hide.name: Hide wrap
basic_hilt/wrap_hide.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative hilt effects.
basic_hilt/wrap_vine.name: Vine wrap
basic_hilt/wrap_vine.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative hilt effects.
Wrap the hilt using the provided materials. Slighly increases damage and speed, and reduces negative effects potentially caused by the hilt.
tetra/schema/sword/basic_hilt/wrap_hilt_: Improve the hilt wrap, further increasing damage and speed, and reducing negative effects.
Further improve the hilt wrap, increasing damage and speed, and reducing negative effects.
sword/decorative_pommel.name: Decorative pommel
sword/decorative_pommel.description: A decorative pommel, it provides a small amount of durability but has no functional value.
sword/makeshift_guard.name: Makeshift guard
sword/makeshift_guard.description: A sword guard, its weak construction provides little protection for the wielding hand.
tetra/schema/sword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
tetra/schema/sword/wide_guard.descriptio: Craft a wide guard which protects the wielding hand, providing additional armor when held in the main-hand or off-hand.
sword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
sword/wide_guard.description: a wide guard which protects the wielding hand. Provides additional armor when the sword is held in the main-hand or off-hand.
tetra/schema/sword/socket.name: Socket
tetra/schema/sword/socket.description: Socket a gem into the sword, providing different effects depending on the gem.
sword/socket.name: Socket
sword/socket.description: A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.
sword_socket/pristine_diamond.descriptio:
A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.
sword_socket/pristine_emerald.descriptio:
A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.
sword_socket/pristine_lapis.description:
A gem, fitted onto the sword where the blade meets the hilt. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder of the sword.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides improved effects compared to a gem of lesser quality.
tetra/schema/sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
tetra/schema/sword/counterweight.descrip: Balance the blade with a counterweight. Greatly increases attack speed if the counterweight consumes the same amount of integrity as all other modules combined. If integrity usage differs the bonus is reduced, a large difference reduces the bonus further and may even reduce the attack speed.
sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
sword/counterweight.description: A counterweight attached to the bottom of the hilt. Greatly increases attack speed if the counterweight consumes the same amount of integrity as all other modules combined. If integrity usage differs the bonus is reduced, a large difference reduces the bonus further and may even reduce the attack speed.
tetra/schema/sword/reinforced_fuller.des: Reinforce the fuller using the given material. Provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
sword/reinforced_fuller.name: Reinforced fuller
sword/reinforced_fuller.description: A fuller reinforcement that provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra/schema/sword/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schema/sword/binding.description: Tighten the binding between the hilt and the blade by wrapping it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
sword/binding.name: Binding
sword_binding/string.description: Tightly bound strings strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/leather.description: Tightly bound leather straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/hide.description: Tightly bound hide straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/vine.description: Tightly bound vine straps strengthens the blade's attachment to the hilt.
sword_binding/bolt.description: An adjustable bolt attaches the blade to the hilt.
sword_tweak/binding_bolt.label: Bolt tightness
sword_tweak/binding_bolt.tooltip:
§eTighten§r the bolt to make the sword more stiff, increasing damage.
§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
tetra/schema/sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
tetra/schema/sword/forefinger_ring.descr: Attach a ring at the top of the hilt, greatly increasing grip. Increases the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
sword/forefinger_ring.description: A ring has been attached at the top of the hilt. The ring allows for a better grip, increasing the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
tetra/schema/sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra/schema/sword/grip_loop.description: Attach a loop at the end of the hilt, which increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
sword/grip_loop.description: A loop attached at the end of the hilt that increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra/schema/sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
tetra/schema/sword/short_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with a blade that's shorter and lighter than the common blade. Allows the wielder to swing at a faster rate, but deals slightly less damage per swing compared to a regular blade. The short blade is not capable of sweeping attacks.
sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
sword/short_blade.description: A blade that's shorter and lighter than the common blade, allows for a faster swing rate but deals slightly less damage per swing.
short_blade/jungle.name: Stinger
short_blade/flint.name: Dagger
short_blade/iron.name: Dagger
short_blade/gold.name: Dagger
short_blade/prismarine.name: Shanker
short_blade/copper.name: Dagger
short_blade/tin.name: Dagger
short_blade/silver.name: Dagger

short_blade/steel.name: Dagger
short_blade/thaumium.name: Dagger
short_blade/ironwood.name: Dagger
short_blade/steeleaf.name: Dagger
short_blade/fierymetal.name: Dagger
short_blade/knightmetal.name: Dagger
tetra/schema/sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra/schema/sword/heavy_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with a large and hefty blade. Sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Has a powerful sweeping attack on fully charged attacks.
sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
sword/heavy_blade.description: A large and hefty blade that sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Has a powerful sweeping attack on fully charged attacks.
heavy_blade/crushing.name: Crushing
heavy_blade/stone.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/granite.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/diorite.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/andesite.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/copper.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/tin.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/silver.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/nickel.name: Cleaver

heavy_blade/bronze.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/electrum.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/steel.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/thaumium.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/ironwood.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/steeleaf.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/fierymetal.name: Cleaver
heavy_blade/knightmetal.name: Cleaver
tetra/schema/sword/machete.name: Machete
tetra/schema/sword/machete.description: Replace the current sword blade with a machete forged from the provided material, which can be used to cut down plants in an area. The machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
sword/machete.name: Machete
sword/machete.description:
A machete which can be used to cut down plants in an area, it deals average damage and has an average attack speed.

The machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra/schema/sword/stonecutter.name: Stonecutter
tetra/schema/sword/stonecutter.descripti: Replace the current blade with the stonecutter, a heavy blade that cuts through stone with ease.
sword/stonecutter.name: Stonecutter
sword/stonecutter.description: A heavy blade that cuts through stone with ease.
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_dur: Hone the module to increase the durability it provides by 4%%.
Further hone the durability improvement for this module, increasing the durability bonus from 4%% to 9%%.
Further hone the durability improvement for this module, increasing the durability bonus from 9%% to 13%%.
Further hone the durability improvement for this module, increasing the durability bonus from 13%% to 18%%.
Further hone the durability improvement for this module, increasing the durability bonus from 18%% to 22%%.
head_hone/durability.name: Hone: Durability
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_spe: Hone the module to increase the overall swing speed by 0.03.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.03 to 0.07.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.07 to 0.1.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.1 to 0.14.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 0.14 to 0.17.
head_hone/speed.name: Hone: Speed
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_dam: Hone the module to increase the damage dealt by 0.5.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 0.5 to 1.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 1 to 1.5.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 1.5 to 2.
Further hone the damage improvement for this module, increasing the damage bonus from 2 to 3.
head_hone/damage.name: Hone: Damage
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_axe: Hone the module to increase efficiency for chopping by 1.
Further hone the chop efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 1 to 2.5.
Further hone the chop efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 2.5 to 5.
Further hone the chop efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 5 to 10.
Further hone the chop efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 10 to 15.
head_hone/axe_efficiency.name: Hone: Chop Efficiency
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_axe: Hone the module to increase chopping tier by 1.
head_hone/axe_tier.name: Hone: Chop Tier
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_sho: Hone the module to increase efficiency for digging by 1.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 1 to 2.5.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 2.5 to 5.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 5 to 10.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 10 to 15.
head_hone/shovel_efficiency.name: Hone: Dig Efficiency
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_sho: Hone the module to increase digging tier by 1.
head_hone/shovel_tier.name: Hone: Dig Tier
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_pic: Hone the module to increase efficiency for mining by 1.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 1 to 2.5.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 2.5 to 5.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 5 to 10.
Further hone the dig efficiency improvement for this module, increasing the efficiency bonus from 10 to 15.
head_hone/pickaxe_efficiency.name: Hone: Mine Efficiency
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_pic: Hone the module to increase mining tier by 1.
head_hone/pickaxe_tier.name: Hone: Mine Tier
tetra/schema/duplex/shared_head/hone_ham: Hone the module to increase hammer tier by 1.
head_hone/hammer_tier.name: Hone: Hammer Tier
tetra/schema/duplex/basic_handle/basic_h: Replace the handle for the head. A sturdier handle supports heavier and more advanced tool heads.
duplex/basic_handle.name: Basic handle
duplex/basic_handle.description: A basic tool handle. Handles are the primary source of integrity for tools.
basic_handle/blazing.name: Blazing
basic_handle/blazing.description: Using this may set you on fire, more sever in hot environments.
basic_handle/ender_reverb.name: Ender reverb
basic_handle/ender_reverb.description: Reacts negatively with nearby entities originating from the end.
basic_handle/wrap_string.name: String wrap
basic_handle/wrap_string.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
basic_handle/wrap_leather.name: Leather wrap
basic_handle/wrap_leather.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
basic_handle/wrap_hide.name: Hide wrap
basic_handle/wrap_hide.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
basic_handle/wrap_vine.name: Vine wrap
basic_handle/wrap_vine.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
tetra/schema/duplex/basic_handle/wrap_ha: Wrap the handle using the provided materials. Slighly increases damage and speed, and reduces negative effects potentially caused by the handle.
Improve the handle wrap, further increasing damage and speed, and reducing negative effects.
Further improve the handle wrap, increasing damage and speed, and reducing negative effects.
tetra/schema/duplex/basic_handle/hone_sp: Hone the handle to increase the overall swing speed by 4%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 4%% to 9%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 9%% to 13%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 13%% to 18%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 18%% to 22%%.
handle_hone/speed.name: Hone: Speed
tetra/schema/duplex/socket.name: Socket
tetra/schema/duplex/socket.description: Socket a gem into the tool, providing different effects depending on the gem.
duplex/socket.name: Socket
duplex/socket.description: A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
duplex_socket/pristine_diamond.descripti:
A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the tools wielder.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
duplex_socket/pristine_emerald.descripti:
A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the tools wielder.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
duplex_socket/pristine_lapis.description:
A gem, fitted onto the side of the tool head. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the tools wielder.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
tetra/schema/duplex/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schema/duplex/binding.description: Bind the tool head to the handle by binding it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
duplex/binding.name: Binding
duplex_binding/string.description: Tightly bound strings strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/leather.description: Tightly bound leather straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/hide.description: Tightly bound hide straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/vine.description: Tightly bound vine straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
duplex_binding/bolt.description: An adjustable bolt attaches the tool head to the handle.
duplex_tweak/binding_bolt.label: Bolt tightness
duplex_tweak/binding_bolt.tooltip:
§eTighten§r the bolt to make the tool more rigid, increasing gathering efficiency.
§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
Forge an axe head from the given material. The axe can primarily be used to chop things like planks and logs, but it's also useful for stripping bark from logs and for crafting item modules from wood.

Double axe heads provide synergy bonuses.
duplex/basic_axe.name: Axe head
duplex/basic_axe.description:
A basic axe head that can primarily be used to chop things like planks and logs, but it's also useful for stripping bark from logs and crafting item modules from wood.

Double axe heads provide synergy bonuses.
basic_axe/severing.name: Severing
basic_axe/severing.description: Deals bonus damage to unarmored targets
tetra/schema/duplex/basic_pickaxe/basic_:
Forge a pickaxe head from the given material.

Double pickaxe heads may provide synergy bonuses.
duplex/basic_pickaxe.name: Pickaxe head
duplex/basic_pickaxe.description:
A basic pickaxe head that can be used for mining.

Double pickaxe heads may provide synergy bonuses.
basic_pickaxe/smelting.name: Smelting
basic_pickaxe/puncturing.name: Puncturing
tetra/schema/duplex/butt/butt.name: Tool butt
tetra/schema/duplex/butt/butt.descriptio: Used as the back side of a single sided tool, typically yields faster swing speed than a double sided tool. Can sometimes be used for hammering if crafted from a sturdy material.
duplex/butt.name: Tool butt
duplex/butt.description: The back side of a single sided tool, typically yields faster swing speed than a double sided head.
tetra/schema/duplex/basic_hammer/basic_h:
Forge a hammer head from the given material. The hammer is useful for crafting modular items, and is sometimes used for salvaging.

Double hammer heads may provide synergy bonuses.
duplex/basic_hammer.name: Hammer head
duplex/basic_hammer.description:
The hammer head can be used when crafting modular items, and is sometimes used for salvaging.

Double hammer heads may provide synergy bonuses.
basic_hammer/log.name: Mallet
tetra/schema/duplex/adze/adze.name: Adze head
tetra/schema/duplex/adze/adze.descriptio: Craft an adze head from the given material. The adze can primarily be used for digging but can also be used for chopping wood.
duplex/adze.name: Adze head
duplex/adze.description: A hefty arched blade at right angles to the handle. The adze can primarily be used for digging but can also be used for chopping wood.
tetra/schema/duplex/claw/claw.name: Claw
tetra/schema/duplex/claw/claw.descriptio: Craft a claw from the given material. The claw can be used for prying things open and to quickly break most wooden blocks.
duplex/claw.name: Claw
duplex/claw.description: A slightly curved claw that can be used for prying things open, and can quickly break most wooden blocks.
tetra/schema/duplex/hoe/hoe.name: Hoe
tetra/schema/duplex/hoe/hoe.description: Craft a hoe from the given material, the hoe can be used for tilling soil.
duplex/hoe.name: Hoe
duplex/hoe.description: A basic hoe, useful for tilling soil.
tetra/schema/duplex/sickle/sickle.name: Sickle
tetra/schema/duplex/sickle/sickle.descri: Craft a sickle from the given material, which can be used to cut blocks in an area. The sickle works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
duplex/sickle.name: Sickle
duplex/sickle.description:
A slightly arched sickle which can be used to cut blocks in an area.

Works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
Replace the handle a basic handle crafted from the given materials. A sturdier handle supports heavier and more advanced tool heads.
single/basic_handle.name: Basic handle
single/basic_handle.description: A basic handle. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
Replace the handle with a lighter handle that allows the item to be thrown, but it provides less durability than other handles.
single/light_handle.name: Light handle
single/light_handle.description: A lighter handle that provides less durability but allows the item to be thrown. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
tetra/schema/single/handle/long_handle.d: Replace the handle with a longer handle that yields longer reach.
single/long_handle.name: Long handle
single/long_handle.description: A longer handle that yields longer reach. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
single_handle/blazing.name: Blazing
single_handle/blazing.description: Using this may set you on fire, more sever in hot environments.
single_handle/ender_reverb.name: Ender reverb
single_handle/ender_reverb.description: Reacts negatively with nearby entities originating from the end.
single_handle/wrap_string.name: String wrap
single_handle/wrap_string.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
single_handle/wrap_leather.name: Leather wrap
single_handle/wrap_leather.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
single_handle/wrap_hide.name: Hide wrap
single_handle/wrap_hide.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
single_handle/wrap_vine.name: Vine wrap
single_handle/wrap_vine.description: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
tetra/schema/single/handle/wrap_handle.d: Wrap the handle using the provided materials. Slighly increases damage and speed, and reduces negative effects potentially caused by the handle.
tetra/schema/single/handle/wrap_handle_h: Improve the handle wrap, further increasing damage and speed, and reducing negative effects.
Further improve the handle wrap, increasing damage and speed, and reducing negative effects.
Hone the handle to increase the overall swing speed by 4%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 4%% to 9%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 9%% to 13%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 13%% to 18%%.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus from 18%% to 22%%.
tetra/schema/single/socket.name: Socket
tetra/schema/single/socket.description: Attach a gem where the head meets the handle. Different gems provide different effects.
single/socket.name: Socket
single/socket.description: A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
single_socket/pristine_diamond.descripti:
A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
single_socket/pristine_emerald.descripti:
A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
single_socket/pristine_lapis.description:
A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.

The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
tetra/schema/single/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schema/single/binding.description: Bind the tool head to the handle by binding it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
single/binding.name: Binding
single_binding/string.description: Tightly bound strings strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
single_binding/leather.description: Tightly bound leather straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
single_binding/hide.description: Tightly bound hide straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
single_binding/prismarine.description: A chunk of prismarine seemingly fuse the head onto handle.
single_binding/vine.description: Tightly bound vine straps strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
single_binding/bolt.description: An adjustable bolt attaches the tool head to the handle.
single_tweak/binding_bolt.label: Bolt tightness
single_tweak/binding_bolt.tooltip:
§eTighten§r the bolt to make the tool more rigid, increasing gathering efficiency.
§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
tetra/schema/single/basic_shovel/basic_s: Forge an axe head from the given material. The shovel can primarily be used to dig into the earth, but it's also useful for make dirt paths.
single/basic_shovel.name: Shovel head
single/basic_shovel.description: A basic shovel head that can primarily be used to dig into the earth, but it's also useful for make dirt paths.
Craft a spearhead from the given material, which can typically be used to cause damage to others.
single/spearhead.name: Spearhead
single/spearhead.description: A basic spearhead which can be used to cause damage to others.
single/trident.name: Trident
single/trident.description: A trident head. The knowledge of how one is made has been lost to time
tetra/schema/single/spearhead/serrated_1: Serrate the head. Attacks have a 30%% chance to cause the target to bleed for 4 damage over 2 seconds. Not effective against undead.
tetra/schema/single/spearhead/serrated_2: Hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 8.
tetra/schema/single/spearhead/serrated_3: Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 16.
spearhead/serrated.name: Serrated
tetra/schema/single/spearhead/tempered_1: Temper the the blade, greatly increasing its hardness. Causes some of the damage dealt to ignore armor.
tetra/schema/single/spearhead/tempered_2: Hone the tempered improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 3.
tetra/schema/single/spearhead/tempered_3: Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 5.
spearhead/tempered.name: Tempered
spearhead_hone/damage.name: Hone: Damage
tetra/schema/single/earthpiercer/earthpi: Replace the current head with the earthpiercer, a heavy tool head that resembles a spearhead. It's unwieldy but it easily cuts through stone.
single/earthpiercer.name: Earthpiercer
single/earthpiercer.description: A heavy tool head that resembles a spearhead. It's unwieldy but it easily cuts through stone.
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.quick.quickAcces: A suitable tool can be quickly drawn from this slot
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.quiver.quickAcce: Arrows can be drawn straight from this slot
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.storage.quickAcc: Items can be restocked into this slot
toolbelt.effect.tooltip.storage.cellSock: Modules can draw power from cells in this slot
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_0.name: Woolen sash
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_0.descri: A rope and some leather scraps proved to be a great way to gain easy access to one of your tools, but the rope lacks the strength to support additional tools. Weaving a sash out of wool should provide better support than simply tying a rope around your waist.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_1.name: Leather wrap
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_1.descri: With the proper tools at hand you should be able to cut leather into a long strap, which should prove even stronger than a belt fashioned from wool.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_2.name: Belt buckle
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_2.descri: A buckle instead of a knot should provide additional support for carrying things around your waist.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_3.name: Shulker inlay
tetra/schema/toolbelt/belt/belt_3.descri: Shulker shells proved exceptional as support when carrying chests, inlaying shells into the belt should further increase its integrity.
toolbelt/belt.name: Toolbelt
belt/rope.name: Rope
belt/rope.description: A very basic waistband fashioned from a rope. Can hold a very limited amount of attachments.
belt/sash.name: Sash
belt/sash.description: A woolen sash that can hold a small amount of attachments.
belt/leather.name: Wrap
belt/leather.description: A sturdy leather strap that can be wrapped around ones waist. Can hold a decent amount of attachments.
belt/buckled.description: A sturdy leather belt, locked in place with a buckle. Can hold a large amount of attachments.
belt/inlaid.description: A sturdy leather belt that has been inlaid with shulker shells. Can hold an impressive amount of attachments.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_1.name: Belt strap
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_1.desc: Attach a single strap to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_2.name: Belt strap (2x)
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_2.desc: Attach two straps to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_3.name: Belt strap (3x)
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_3.desc: Attach three straps to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_4.name: Belt strap (4x)
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/strap_4.desc: Attach four straps to the belt, which can be used for carrying and quickly accessing tools or other items.
strap1/leather.description: A leather strap that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
strap1/iron.description: An iron loop that can be used to hang an item off the belt, allowing quick access to a frequently used tool or weapon.
strap2/leather.description: Two leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap2/iron.description: Two iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap3/leather.description: Three leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap3/iron.description: Three iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap4/leather.description: Four leather straps that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
strap4/iron.description: Four iron loops that can be used to hang items off the belt, allowing quick access to frequently used tools or weapons.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/potion_storage.des: Attach a small bag specifically designed for carrying potions. The bag stores a large amount of potions, but can only support a small set of different types of potions.
toolbelt/potion_storage.name: Potion bag
toolbelt/potion_storage.description: A small bag specifically designed for carrying potions. The bag stores a large amount of potions, but can only support a small set of different types of potions.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/storage/storage.de: Attach a small pouch to the toolbelt, which can store a decent amount of items. The contents of the pouch are not available using the toolbelt's quick access functionality.
toolbelt/storage.name: Storage pouch
toolbelt/storage.description: A small pouch which can store a decent amount of items. The contents of the pouch are not available using the toolbelt's quick access functionality.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/quiver/quiver.name: Quiver
tetra/schema/toolbelt/quiver/quiver.desc: Attach a quiver to the toolbelt. The quiver can hold a large amount of arrows.
toolbelt/quiver.name: Quiver
toolbelt/quiver.description: A quiver that can hold a large amount of arrows.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/booster.name: Booster
tetra/schema/toolbelt/booster.descriptio: Attach a booster unit, which grants the ability to jump long distances or even fly for shorter periods of time. Activate by crouching before a jump, or by jumping mid air or while flying with an elytra. §oUses gunpowder from toolbelt inventories as fuel.
toolbelt/booster.name: Booster
toolbelt/booster.description: A booster unit which grants the ability to jump long distances or even fly for shorter periods of time. Activate by crouching before a jump, or by jumping mid air or while flying with an elytra. §oUses gunpowder from toolbelt inventories as fuel.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/strap/quickslot.de:
Using a quick latch mechanism for locking the strap in place allows faster access to the tool held by the strap.

§7Tapping the toolbelt access hotkey will attempt to equip the first item suitable for breaking or salvaging the block you're looking at. Tools can only be equipped from slots with this upgrade.
strap/quick_latch.name: Quick latch
strap/quick_latch.description: Tapping the toolbelt hotkey will quickly equip the most suitable tool from this inventory.
tetra/schema/toolbelt/quiver/quickslot.d:
Upgrade the quiver with a quick latch mechanism, allowing quicker access to arrows in the quiver.

§7Drawing a bow with no ammo available will automatically grab an arrow from the first stack in the quiver.
quiver/quick_latch.name: Quick latch
quiver/quick_latch.description: Arrows will be automatically drawn from this quiver when no ammo is available.
Upgrade the pouch with a quick latch mechanism, making it easier to stash items into it.

§7Held items can be put into the pouch using the restock hotkey.
storage/quick_latch.name: Quick latch
storage/quick_latch.description: Held items can be stashed into the pouch using the restock hotkey.
tetra/schema/bow/string/basic_string.des: Replaces the bowstring with a new basic bowstring crafted from the given materials. The bowstring is the primary source of integrity for bows.
bow/basic_string.name: Basic string
bow/basic_string.description: A basic bowstring. The bowstring is the primary source of integrity for bows.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/straight_stave.de: Replaces the stave with a new straight stave crafted from the given materials.
bow/straight_stave.name: Straight stave
tetra/schema/bow/stave/long_stave.name: Long stave
tetra/schema/bow/stave/long_stave.descri: Replaces the stave with a new long stave crafted from the given materials. Longbows typically have a slower draw speed but deal more damage than other bows.
bow/long_stave.name: Long stave
bow/long_stave.description: A long bow stave. Longbows typically have a slower draw speed but deal more damage than other bows.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/recurve_stave.des: Replaces the stave with a new recurve stave crafted from the given materials. Recurve bows typically have a faster draw speed than other types of bows.
bow/recurve_stave.name: Recurve stave
bow/recurve_stave.description: A recurve bow stave. Recurve bows typically have a faster draw speed than other types of bows.
tetra/schema/bow/string/release_latch.de:
Repurpose a quick latch into a release mechanism for the bow, which makes it easier to consecutively loose arrows.
Automatically fire arrows when the bow is fully drawn.
bowstring/release_latch.name: Release latch
bowstring/release_latch.description: Slightly increases drawspeed & automatically loose arrows.
stave_grip/wrap_string.name: String wrap
stave_grip/wrap_string.description: Slightly increases drawspeed, reduces negative hilt effects.
stave_grip/wrap_leather.name: Leather wrap
stave_grip/wrap_leather.description: Slightly increases drawspeed, reduces negative hilt effects.
stave_grip/wrap_hide.name: Hide wrap
stave_grip/wrap_hide.description: Slightly increases drawspeed, reduces negative hilt effects.
stave_grip/wrap_vine.name: Vine wrap
stave_grip/wrap_vine.description: Slightly increases drawspeed, reduces negative hilt effects.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/wrap_grip.name: Wrap grip
tetra/schema/bow/stave/wrap_grip.descrip: Wrap the grip using the provided materials. Slighly increases drawspeed, and reduces negative effects potentially caused by the stave material.
Improve the grip wrap, further increasing drawspeed, and reducing negative effects.
Further improve the hilt wrap, increasing drawspeed, and reducing negative effects.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_1.name: Hone: Speed I
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_1.desc: Hone the module to increase the overall draw speed.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_2.name: Hone: Speed II
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_2.desc: Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_3.name: Hone: Speed III
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_3.desc: Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_4.name: Hone: Speed IV
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_4.desc: Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_5.name: Hone: Speed V
tetra/schema/bow/stave/hone_speed_5.desc: Further hone the draw speed improvement for this module.
stave_hone/speed.name: Hone: Speed
tetra/schema/bow/string/hone_damage_1.de: Hone the module to increase the overall damage.
tetra/schema/bow/string/hone_damage_2.de: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
tetra/schema/bow/string/hone_damage_3.de: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
tetra/schema/bow/string/hone_damage_4.de: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
tetra/schema/bow/string/hone_damage_5.de: Further hone the damage improvement for this module.
bowstring_hone/damage.name: Hone: Damage
tetra/schema/bow/riser/adjustable_streng: Attach two bolts to the riser. By fastening or unfastening the bolts it's possible to §ltweak§r the strength of the bow.
bow/adjustable_strength.name: Limb adjuster
adjustable_strength/bolt.description: Attach two bolts to the riser. By fastening or unfastening the bolts it's possible to §ltweak§r the strength of the bow.
bow/adjustable_strength.label: Bow strength
bow/adjustable_strength.tooltip:
§eTighten§r the bolts to increase the bow strength, increasing damage.
§eLoosen§r the bolts to make the bow easier to draw, increasing draw speed.
